    • 方法详细资料

      • copy

        public boolean copy(java.io.File from,
           java.io.File to)
        Copies a file.
        指定者:
        copy 在接口中 ICopyTool
        参数:
        from - The file to copy.
        to - The destination file.
        返回:
        `true' iff the file was successfully copied.

      • isValidSource

        private boolean isValidSource(java.io.File candidate)
        Checks if the specified File is a valid source.
        参数:
        candidate - The File to check.
        返回:
        `true' iff the File is a valid source.

      • isValidDestination

        private boolean isValidDestination(java.io.File candidate)
        Checks if the specified File represents a valid destination.
        参数:
        candidate - The file to check.
        返回:
        `true' iff the File is a valid destination.

      • cleanup

        private void cleanup(java.io.File trash)
        Tries to remove a partially copied file in case of failure.
        参数:
        trash - The file to remove.

      • execute

                       java.lang.String stdin)
        Executes the tool with args provided in the constructor

        execute 在接口中 ITool
        指定者:
        execute 在类中 ATool
        参数:
        workingDir -
        stdin - Input on stdin. NOT THE ARGUMENTS! Can be null.
        返回:
        Output on stdout
